headline.print_headline: Neymar Vows Business as Usual Amid Suspension Fears
headline.main: Neymar Vows Business as Usual Amid Suspension Fears

lead_paragraph: Brazilian striker Neymar has played down talk that a yellow card in the World Cup opener against Croatia will force him into a less aggressive style of play, with fans and backroom staff worrying that a second caution could see him banned from a vital knock-out match.
